experience.title: experience
experience.description:
With 2 years of experience in front-end development, I have contributed to building and optimizing modern web interfaces for various applications. I have hands-on experience working with frameworks like React.js and Next.js, integrating RESTful APIs and GraphQL, and collaborating closely with designers and backend developers to deliver responsive and accessible user experiences.

During this time, I've also become proficient in using tools like Git, Webpack, and modern CSS methodologies to ensure clean, maintainable code and smooth project workflows.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
As a front-end developer, I have solid knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and TypeScript. I'm skilled in working with React.js, including hooks, context API, and component architecture. I also have experience with Next.js for server-side rendering and static site generation.

I’m familiar with version control using Git, styling frameworks such as Tailwind CSS or SCSS, and building responsive, mobile-friendly interfaces. I regularly use debugging tools and browser dev tools to ensure cross-browser compatibility and performance optimization.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
I bring strong communication skills, a collaborative mindset, and a willingness to learn and adapt quickly.

I’m comfortable working in agile teams, participating in code reviews, and giving or receiving constructive feedback. I value clean code, teamwork, and continuously improving both technically and professionally.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
I am a front-end developer with 2 years of experience building responsive and user-friendly web applications. I enjoy turning design ideas into real products using modern technologies like React and Next.js. I'm passionate about clean code, continuous learning, and working in collaborative environments.

I believe in creating experiences that are not only functional but also visually engaging and accessible to all users.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I enjoy playing badminton, traveling, and sightseeing. These hobbies help me relax and stay motivated both in and outside of work. I also love exploring new technologies and improving my development skills through personal projects and tutorials.

education.title: education
education.description:
I studied in Da Nang, Vietnam, where I developed a strong foundation in web development and software engineering. My academic background has equipped me with both theoretical and practical knowledge in front-end technologies.

During my university years, I focused on subjects such as web programming, UI/UX design, and software architecture.

1.title: App Music
1.description: App Music is a music player application that allows users to listen to their favorite songs, create playlists, and discover new music.

2.title: Car rent
2.description: Car Rent is a web application for renting cars, allowing users to browse available vehicles, check prices, and make reservations.

3.title: Crawl SenDo
3.description: Crawl SenDo is a web scraping tool that collects data from the SenDo website, allowing users to extract and analyze information efficiently.

4.title: Tiktok clone
4.description: Tiktok Clone is a web application that mimics the functionality of TikTok, allowing users to create, share, and view short videos.

5.title: Genz Mental Health
5.description: Genz Mental Health is a web application designed to provide mental health resources and support for the Gen Z community.

6.title: Portfolio
6.description: Portfolio is a personal website that showcases my projects, skills, and experiences as a front-end developer.
